title: 5 Relationship Mistakes You Must Avoid to Find Deeper Connection w/ Jay Shetty [AWKWARD THERAPY] EP 1322
description:
Welcome to my NEW series "Awkward Therapy" with my good friend Jay Shetty, who is an award winning host, storyteller and viral content creator. In this series, we are aiming to discuss different taboo topics in an effort to create a comfortable dialogue.

Follow Jay's Podcast:

Apple Podcasts

Spotify

In this episode you will learn:

  • Why becoming more independent will help you in your relationships.
  • All the questions you should ask yourself in any relationship.
  • Tips for how to evolve and find deeper connection in your relationship.
  • The difference between a successful relationship and a long-lasting relationship.
  • How to find your definition of love.

For more, go to lewishowes.com/1322

Check out more from Jay Shetty here!

Can You Make Money & Also Be Spiritual? w/ Jay Shetty [AWKWARD THERAPY]: https://link.chtbl.com/1298-pod

Mindset Habits for Happiness, and Thinking Like a Monk: https://link.chtbl.com/1003-pod

Train Your Mind for Peace and Purpose Everyday: https://link.chtbl.com/953-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
